means: [人名] [英格兰人姓氏] 普劳德绰号，来源于中世纪英语，含义是“傲慢的”(proud)

sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些形容词都有"骄傲的，傲慢的"之意。
means: haughty ： 较正式用词，多用于贬义。指对身份或地位比自己低的人采取冷淡、轻视或鄙互的态度。
proud ： 含义广，普通用词。褒义指自豪和荣耀以及强烈的自尊；贬义则指傲慢，自以为是或自鸣得意。
arrogant ： 用于贬义，指过高估计自己，以致骄傲自大或傲慢无礼，目中无人。
vain ： 指一个对自己的外表或对自己留给别的印象太过分地关注，以致自命不凡，自鸣得意。

sentence.Network_en: Derek is now the proud father of a bouncing baby girl.
sentence.Network_cn: 德里克现在为有一个健康活泼的女宝宝而骄傲。

sentence.Network_en: She noticed her own proud walk had become a shuffle.
sentence.Network_cn: 她意识到自己趾高气扬的步伐已变成了拖着脚走路了。

sentence.Network_en: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.

PerfectNetExp.abs: 九年级英语单词表 ... certainly 确实地；无疑地 proud 自豪的；骄傲的 flag 旗；旗帜.
九年级英语单词表 ... certainly 确实地；无疑地 proud 自豪的；骄傲的 flag 旗；旗帜.
慢_百度百科 ... 从慢走引申为缓慢[ slow] 骄傲；傲慢[ proud] 生疏[ unfamiliar;rusty].
稚字的解释---在线新华字典 ... 晚;暮〖 late〗 骄傲放纵;傲慢〖 arrogant;proud〗 稚气 zhìq&#236.

list.abs: 什么意... ... walking race 竞走 ; 竞走项目 ; 赛跑 walking proud 滨崎步 ; 私物语 walking stick 手杖 ; 健走杖 ; 拐杖 ; 拐棍.
引以为傲 English, 翻译, 例句, 字典... ... 傲扁蜡蝉属 ommatissus 傲立 standing proud 傲睨 to look down upon.
你只需要用心感觉 ... 我很骄傲 I'm proud 而我很固执 and I'm headstrong.
英语新词汇与常用词汇的翻译 _ 上海疯狂英语... ... protuberant 突起的 proud flesh 疤 proud 自豪的.
赘这字怎么读，有什么含义？_百度知道 ... 赘词[ unnecessary talk] 赘肉[ proud flesh] 赘生[ excrescence].

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)act in a way that gives someone cause to feel pleased or satisfied
jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)使某人有理由感到高兴（或满意）

lj.lj_ly: they did themselves proud in a game which sent the fans home happy.
lj.lj_ls: 他们在比赛中为自己增了光，让球迷心满意足地回家了。

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Old English prūt, prūd 'having a high opinion of one's own worth', from Old French prud 'valiant', based on Latin prodesse 'be of value'. The phrase proud flesh dates back to late Middle English, but the sense 'slightly projecting' is first recorded in English dialect of the 19th cent

entry.def: If you feel proud, you feel pleased about something good that you possess or have done, or about something good that a person close to you has done.

example.ex: I felt proud of his efforts...
example.tran: 我为他的努力感到骄傲。

example.ex: They are proud that she is doing well at school...
example.tran: 他们为她出色的学习成绩感到骄傲。

entry.tran: 最值得夸耀的；最引以为荣的
entry.def: Your proudest moments or achievements are the ones that you are most proud of.

example.ex: This must have been one of the proudest moments of his busy and hard working life.
example.tran: 这一定是他劳碌工作的一生中最引以为荣的时刻之一。

entry.def: Someone who is proud has respect for themselves and does not want to lose the respect that other people have for them.

example.ex: He was too proud to ask his family for help and support...
example.tran: 他自尊心太强，不愿向家人寻求帮助和支持。

example.ex: We are a proud people. We are not used to begging or taking things.
example.tran: 我们是有自尊的民族。我们不习惯乞讨或接受施舍。

entry.tran: 骄傲的；傲慢的；妄自尊大的
entry.def: Someone who is proud feels that they are better or more important than other people.

example.ex: She was said to be proud and arrogant.

entry.def: If one object stands proud of another object that it is attached to or next to, it extends beyond it.

example.ex: The handles stand proud of the doors of the car.

entry.tran: 盛情款待；给…以隆重待遇
entry.def: If someone does you proud, they treat you very well, for example by welcoming you and giving you good food and entertainment.

example.ex: The hotel has indeed done them proud.
example.tran: 这家宾馆的确对他们盛情款待。

means.word_mean: 1. feeling self-respect or pleasure in something by which you measure your self-worth; or being a reason for pride;
2. having or displaying great dignity or nobility;

auth_sentence.content: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.
auth_sentence.res_content: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: British racing should be tremendously proud of their contribution.

auth_sentence.content: I'm really proud of what we've achieved.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm really proud of what we've achieved.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm really proud of what we've achieved.

auth_sentence.content: I'm proud to see how he has flourished.
auth_sentence.res_content: I'm proud to see how he has flourished.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I'm proud to see how he has flourished.

Sentence.sentence: Britain has started to become really proud of the food it's producing.
Most have worked their way up from sales representatives, and they are very proud of the role they played in the company's growth.
He felt proud that he was a do-it-yourself himself.
We seek it out in others and are proud to claim it in ourselves, perhaps even more than good looks or intelligence.
Barry Mills, the president of Bowdoin College, was justifiably proud of Bowdoin's efforts to recruit minority students.

sentences.en: She had been too proud to ask for help.
sentences.cn: 她的自尊心太强, 从不求助于人。

sentences.en: We are proud of our motherland.
He was proud of having such a good friend.
sentences.cn: 他为有这样的好朋友而自豪。

sentences.en: We are proud for you to win the championship.
sentences.cn: 我们为你赢得冠军而骄傲。

sentences.en: We are very proud that a pupil from our school has won the prize.
sentences.cn: 我们学校的一个小学生得了奖, 我们感到很自豪。

means.word_mean: 骄傲的, 傲慢的, 妄自尊大的

sentences.en: She is too proud to see her own mistake.
sentences.cn: 她太骄傲了, 看不到自己的错误。

jushi.english: It was a proud day for us when we won the trophy.
jushi.chinese: 我们夺得奖杯那一天是值得我们骄傲的日子。

jushi.english: She is a proud woman who never accepts somebody else's help.
jushi.chinese: 她是一个高傲之人,从不接受别人的帮助。
他的父母感到光彩向他表示祝贺。
